Title: Pre-Posal
Plot: Neal is going to propose to Amy, but first he has to get her father?s blessing ? and it?s not going to be easy. Milo joins Gibbs on his yearly "samurai cleanse." Tyler finds his first gray hair and is convinced that the end is close? or at least closer.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
